weekly_plan.routine: Brisk walking (30 mins at 3.5-4 mph) + Light Resistance Band Circuit (3 rounds: 10 banded squats, 12 banded rows, 15 glute bridges)
weekly_plan.benefits: Boosts metabolism, activates major muscle groups without joint stress
weekly_plan.tips: Focus on form over speed. Drink water before/after.

weekly_plan.routine: Pilates (Beginner Core - 30 mins: Pelvic tilts, dead bugs, modified planks, seated marches)
weekly_plan.benefits: Strengthens deep core muscles important for PCOS

weekly_plan.routine: Rest or Light Yoga (25 min Yin: Child's pose, cat-cow, seated forward fold, legs up wall)
Bodyweight Strength Training (3 rounds: 10 push-ups (knees ok), 15 chair squats, 20 sec plank, 12 lunges)
weekly_plan.benefits: Builds lean muscle to increase resting metabolism

weekly_plan.routine: Power Yoga (40 mins: Sun salutations, warrior flows, balancing poses)
Long Walk (45-60 mins at comfortable pace) + Stretch (10 mins: Hamstrings, hips, shoulders)
weekly_plan.tips: Walk after largest meal for best blood sugar control

weekly_plan.routine: Complete rest or gentle mobility (5-10 mins light stretching)

phase_2_weeks_3-4.details: Add light resistance bands. Incorporate Pilates pulses (2 sec hold).

phase_3_weeks_5-8.details: Include short intervals (30 sec on/30 sec off). Add 1 HIIT session weekly.

phase_4_weeks_9+.details: Cycle intensity weekly (light/medium/heavy). Track measurements monthly.

nutrition_tips: Include healthy fats with carbs to slow glucose absorption
Consider magnesium supplement for insulin sensitivity

weekly_plan.routine: Walking (Low pace, 20 mins) + Deep Stretch (10 mins: Focus on hips and shoulders)
weekly_plan.benefits: Gentle movement to start week without stress
weekly_plan.tips: Walk indoors if weather is extreme

weekly_plan.routine: Seated Mobility (15 mins: Ankle circles, knee lifts, torso twists) + Breathing (5 mins diaphragmatic breathing)
weekly_plan.tips: Practice after waking or before bed

weekly_plan.routine: Rest or Yoga Nidra (20 min guided relaxation)
Very Light Strength (2 sets of 8 reps: Seated leg lifts, wall push-ups, band pulls)
weekly_plan.tips: Stop if any pain beyond mild fatigue

weekly_plan.routine: Pilates with Support (25 mins using chair or wall for balance)
Nature Walk (20-30 mins) + Journaling (5 mins gratitude)
weekly_plan.tips: Walk barefoot on grass if possible

weekly_plan.routine: Complete rest with optional meditation
weekly_plan.tips: Prep healthy meals for upcoming week

phase_1_weeks_1-3.details: Focus on breathing and short movement sessions (10-15 mins)

phase_2_weeks_4-6.details: Add short walks twice/day (5-10 mins each). Begin light toning.

phase_3_weeks_7-9.details: Single longer walk (20-25 mins) 2x/week. Add resistance bands.

phase_4_weeks_10+.details: Combine walking with 2x/week supported strength. Track energy levels.

nutrition_tips: Small, frequent meals to stabilize blood sugar
Focus on anti-inflammatory foods (berries, leafy greens)
Consider inositol supplement after consulting doctor
Limit caffeine to 1 cup/day before noon

weekly_plan.routine: Walking (30 mins at comfortable pace, can be broken into 10-min sessions)
Chair Yoga (25 mins: Seated cat-cow, seated twists, arm reaches) or Aqua Stretch (in pool if available)
Upper Body Strength (Seated - 3 rounds: 10 arm raises, 12 seated rows with band, 15 shoulder rolls)
Walking (20 mins) + Band Work (2 rounds: 10 seated leg presses, 12 band pulls, 15 calf raises)
Dance (15 mins to favorite music) or Tai Chi (20 mins beginner flow)
Core Stability (10 mins: Seated marches, heel slides, pelvic tilts)
Active rest (gentle stretching or leisure walk)

phase_1_weeks_1-2.details: Establish movement habit. Focus on form.

phase_2_weeks_3-4.details: Add 5 mins to walks weekly. Include 1 circuit workout.

phase_4_weeks_9+.details: Increase resistance gradually. Track non-scale victories.

nutrition_tips: Fill half plate with non-starchy veggies

Gentle Stretch (10 mins: Neck rolls, shoulder shrugs, ankle circles) + Meditation (5 mins guided)
Rest or Aqua Therapy (if available: 15 mins water walking)

phase_2_weeks_5-8.details: Increase to 15 min sessions. Add standing movements.

phase_4_weeks_13+.details: Mix seated and standing movements. Track energy patterns.

nutrition_tips: Consider probiotic foods for gut health

weekly_plan.routine: Walk after meals (15 mins after breakfast/lunch/dinner - can be broken up)

weekly_plan.tips: Add 2 sec pause at peak contraction

phase_2_weeks_3-4.details: Add moderate strength. Include short intervals (1:1 work:rest).

phase_3_weeks_5-8.details: HIIT once weekly. Progressive overload in strength.

phase_4_weeks_9+.details: Cycle intensity. Monitor fasting glucose if possible.

Vinegar before meals may reduce spikes

Stress management as important as diet
